body.p: What is the probability that a value is within one standard deviation of the mean in the probability distribution for changing majors?

explanation.p: So we want the probability that a student changes majors 1, 2 or 3 times.
P(a value is within one standard deviation of the mean) = P(X = 1) + P(X = 2) + P(X = 3) = 0.271 + 0.271 + 0.180 = 0.722.
